original_title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Complete Pluto, Volume 1
overview: Mickey's faithful friend Pluto is unleashed in this first volume of the celebrated canine's cartoon capers. Spanning the years 1930 to 1947, these 29 classic shorts include Pluto's 1930 debut in The Chain Gang - which was actually his first and second appearance playing unnamed, identical bloodhounds - and the 1941 Academy Award winning short Lend a Paw.
title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Complete Pluto, Volume 1
